name: Five Nights with Mr. Hugs & Co.
name_original: Five Nights with Mr. Hugs & Co.
description:
(Disclaimer: This game contains "jumpscares" and should not be taken seriously.)

You are a security guard at the Fazbear Entertainment Storage Facility. It is your job to keep the place safe from all of the "animatronics." But Mr. Hugs didn't come alone... He brought all of his friends! Can you survive until 6 AM?

Download it on Gamejolt

Original Release Date: Oct 14, 2020
